## Hi, I'm Justin Singh-Mohudpur.
  
<img src="img/me.png" style="width: 28%; float: right; margin: 0 0 1em 1em; border-radius:30px"/>

<div class="fs-5 lead">

Hi! Welcome to my project site for my GIS work being done at [University of California, Santa Barbara](https://geog.ucsb.edu/).

***

**A little information about me:**

<ul class="list-group fs-6">
<li class="list-group-item">I'm a senior at UCSB majoring in **Applied Mathematics** with a minor in **Spatial Science**.</li>
<li class="list-group-item">I'm a **Systems Administrator** and **Project Manager** for the *US Air Force Reserves*.</li>
<li class="list-group-item">I like to compete in **orienteering** (<i class="fas fa-map-marked-alt"></i> + <i class="fas fa-compass"></i>), which started my initial interest in geography!</li>
</ul>

**My research interests include:**

<ul class="list-group fs-6">
<li class="list-group-item">**Computational Hydrology**</li>
<li class="list-group-item">**Machine Learning**</li>
<li class="list-group-item">**Algebraic Topology**</li>
</ul>
